name: Elecophysioloical Dataset of Somatic Sodium Channel Current Using Outside-out Recording in the Primate Anterior Insular Cortex
citation: Jing, Junzhan (2026) Elecophysioloical Dataset of Somatic Sodium Channel Current Using Outside-out Recording in the Primate Anterior Insular Cortex (Version draft) [Data set]. DANDI Archive. https://dandiarchive.org/dandiset/001750/draft
description: The dataset contains the intracellular recordings from Macaque Anterior Insular Cortex neurons. We used outside-out patch-clamp recording to collecte the sodium channel current of anterior insular cortex neurons in crab-eating monkeys.
studyTarget: To investigate the differnce of sodium channel currents between VENs and PCs

relatedResource.name: Cell Atlas and Novel Signal Processing Strategy in Primate Insular Cortex
